message: Interested in learning a new language but see how it compares to the one you already know? Check out this side-by-side style comparison of various languages. Because I love scripting, the below link is for Ruby, Python, Perl an PHP.
story: Hamza Elbanna shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Scripting Languages: PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby (Sheet One) - Hyperpolyglot
caption: hyperpolyglot.org
description: sheet one: arithmetic and logic | strings | regexes | dates and time | arrays | dictionaries | functions | execution control                 files | directories | processes and environment
